title: 'Specs'

componentName: 'button'
category: 'components'
subCategory: 'actions'
customPath: '/components/actions/button'
---

<Anatomies>
  <Anatomy>
    <Example>
      <button type="button" class="if button secondary" data-speccer>
        Button
      </button>
      <button type="button" class="if button secondary" data-speccer-measure="width bottom">
        Button
      </button>
      <button type="button" class="if button secondary" data-speccer-measure="height right">
        Button
      </button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Normal sized button</span>
    </Description>
  </Anatomy>
</Anatomies>
<div class="if alert-banner info">
  If you see that the button grows in width when it is active (clicked), this is because we increase the font-weight of
  the text inside the button. To circumvent this, the only good solution as of now is to set the button to a fixed
  width.
</div>
